row.process: :SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = "" :IF &UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -t "&UC4RB_ARCHIVE_PATH#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -s "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER_EX# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -e "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_FILTER_EX#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -g "&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_GUID#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_COMPARE_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -n "&UC4RB_COMPARE_NAME#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_COMPARE_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -r "&UC4RB_REPORT_ID#"') :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_CALLBACK_URL# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_COMMAND#, ' -c "&UC4RB_CALLBACK_URL#"') :ENDIF
